title: Smart Data Models - ExcHU
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Hungarian Excitation System Model, with built-in voltage transducer.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be ExcHU

ae.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Major loop PI tag gain factor (Ae).  Typical Value = 3. Default: 0.0

ai.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minor loop PI tag gain factor (Ai).  Typical Value = 22. Default: 0.0

atr.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. AVR constant (Atr).  Typical Value = 2.19. Default: 0.0

emax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Field voltage control signal upper limit on AVR base (Emax).  Typical Value = 0.996. Default: 0.0

emin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Field voltage control signal lower limit on AVR base (Emin).  Typical Value = -0.866. Default: 0.0

imax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Major loop PI tag output signal upper limit (Imax).  Typical Value = 2.19. Default: 0.0

imin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Major loop PI tag output signal lower limit (Imin).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0.0

ke.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage base conversion constant (Ke).  Typical Value = 4.666. Default: 0.0

ki.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Current base conversion constant (Ki).  Typical Value = 0.21428. Default: 0.0

te.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Major loop PI tag integration time constant (Te).  Typical Value = 0.154. Default: 0

ti.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minor loop PI control tag integration time constant (Ti).  Typical Value = 0.01333. Default: 0

tr.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Filter time constant (Tr). If a voltage compensator is used in conjunction with this excitation system model, Tr should be set to 0.  Typical Value = 0.01. Default: 0
